questions.question_text: Out-of-the-box. cases are automatically closed after how many days?
When are any changes to the platform considered a customization?

choices.D: When there are business demands for custom functionality that is not offered out-of-the-box
choices.B: If they are NOT applied through the usage of built-in tools on the Now Platform
choices.C: When they are solely implemented for a custom application
choices.A: When they require an implementation spread across all project phases

discussion.content: B is incorrect because built-in tools are used for many customizations and Option D describes the need for a customization ("business demands for custom functionality that is not offered out-of-the-box"), but it doesn't explicitly state that a customization has been implemented. I hate such questions!
D describes the need of a customization, but does not say that one has been done.. misleading question.

Selected Answer: D
D is correct

questions.question_text: Which solution must be implemented to let a breakdown dashboard appear as a pop-up window on the case form?
The case digests feature includes which types of case communication? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/tokyo-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/configure-case-digests.html
The correct answer is B and C

Selected Answer: BC
The case digests feature includes two types of case communication:
Case action summary: while a case is in progress, agents can send periodic case updates that describe actions taken, next steps, and other case-related information.
Post case review: when the work on a case has been completed, agents can a post case review document that captures details about the issue, such as the root cause, mitigation plan, and preventive actions.

Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/configure-case-digests.html
BC, see Vancouver: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/configure-case-digests.html

Selected Answer: BC
BC Is Correct.

https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/tokyo-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/configure-case-digests.html

Selected Answer: BC

 - Post case review: when the work on a case has been completed, agents can a post case review document that captures details about the issue, such as the root cause, mitigation plan, and preventive actions.

Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/tokyo-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/configure-case-digests.html
